body_html:
Nope; EOS is not the blank label index. The blank label index is an index emitted by logits to signify "skip emitting a character this time step". It should never appear in the label tensor. The EOS signifies the end of a sentence. Now that I think about it, EOS is usually part of the target label; and padding should be some other value (not EOS, and obviously not the blank label index).
…

body:
Nope; EOS is not the blank label index.  The blank label index is an index
emitted by logits to signify "skip emitting a character this time step".
It should never appear in the label tensor.  The EOS signifies the end of a
sentence.  Now that I think about it, EOS is usually part of the target
label; and padding should be some other value (not EOS, and obviously not
the blank label index).
